The claim was made by Senator Ted Cruz: who accused Donald Trump of having the second-highest disapproval ratings among all presidential candidates.
The claim was based on a video that purp: s adviser stating that Trump had the second-highest disapproval ratings.
The claim was fact: checked by examining various polls, including a national poll conducted by Quinnipiac University, which showed that 57 percent of registered voters had an unfavorable opinion of Trump.
